statements: SELECT * FROM PaaSProviders
SELECT ProviderName, Description FROM PaaSProviders
SELECT * FROM PaaSProviders WHERE ProviderName = 'Google Cloud'
SELECT * FROM PaaSProviders ORDER BY ProviderName DESC
SELECT ProviderName, Type FROM PaaSProviders WHERE Type = 'Database'
SELECT * FROM PaaSProviders ORDER BY ProviderName DESC;
SELECT ProviderName, Description FROM PaaSProviders WHERE IsActive = true;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PaaSProviders WHERE IsActive = true;
SELECT ProviderName, PlatformType FROM PaaSProviders WHERE IsActive = true ORDER BY ProviderName ASC;
SELECT * FROM PaaSProviders WHERE ProviderName LIKE '%Azure%' OR PlatformType = 'SaaS';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT app_name, created_at FROM apps ORDER BY app_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM apps WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT app_name, created_at FROM apps WHERE user_id = 3 AND app_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN apps ON users.user_id = apps.user_id WHERE users.username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY apps.app_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, apps.app_name FROM users LEFT JOIN apps ON users.user_id = apps.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Paas_Providers;
SELECT provider_name, foundation_year FROM Paas_Providers ORDER BY foundation_year;
SELECT * FROM SQL_Databases WHERE db_provider_id = 2;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM Developer_Applications WHERE app_db_id = 3;
SELECT provider_name, foundation_year FROM Paas_Providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Paas_Providers;
SELECT provider_name, foundation_year FROM Paas_Providers WHERE foundation_year > 2000;
SELECT provider_name, db_name FROM Paas_Providers INNER JOIN SQL_Databases ON Paas_Providers.provider_id = SQL_Databases.db_provider_id;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM Developer_Applications WHERE app_db_id = 2;

SELECT app_name, provider_name FROM Developer_Applications INNER JOIN SQL_Databases ON Developer_Applications.app_db_id = SQL_Databases.db_id INNER JOIN Paas_Providers ON SQL_Databases.db_provider_id = Paas_Providers.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM providers;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM providers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT database_id, database_name FROM databases WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT application_name FROM applications WHERE database_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM developers ORDER BY developer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM providers WHERE provider_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT provider_name, database_name FROM providers JOIN databases ON providers.provider_id = databases.provider_id;

SELECT providers.provider_name, applications.application_name FROM providers JOIN databases ON providers.provider_id = databases.provider_id JOIN applications ON databases.database_id = applications.database_id;
SELECT * FROM developers WHERE developer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_region FROM providers ORDER BY provider_region DESC;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM applications WHERE app_id = 1;
SELECT developer_name FROM developers WHERE developer_id = 3;
SELECT providers.provider_name, databases.database_name FROM providers JOIN databases ON providers.provider_id = databases.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM providers WHERE provider_region = 'Europe';
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM applications WHERE database_id IN (SELECT database_id FROM databases WHERE database_type = 'MySQL');
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) AS num_databases FROM providers JOIN databases ON providers.provider_id = databases.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name;

SELECT developers.developer_name, applications.app_name FROM developers JOIN app_developers ON developers.developer_id = app_developers.developer_id JOIN applications ON app_developers.app_id = applications.app_id;

SELECT app_name, developers.developer_name FROM applications LEFT JOIN app_developers ON applications.app_id = app_developers.app_id LEFT JOIN developers ON app_developers.developer_id = developers.developer_id ORDER BY app_name DESC, developers.developer_name ASC;
